downloadTitle: Update Rollup for Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider
downloadDescription: The Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider needs to be installed by the user in order to connect to the Hyper-V Recovery Manager Service
detailsSection:
The Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider needs to be installed by the user in order to connect to the Hyper-V Recovery Manager Service

Feature Summary:
The Update Rollup for Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager provider has all the features available in Update Rollup 1 with additional fixes.
Fix in Update Rollup :
  • Issue 1 : Adding a NIC fails on replica VM when it is not in a correct state. This fix makes the error more user friendly by providing for what is the exact state.
Download and install this provider version to enable the VMM server to communicate to the Azure service to
  • Enable Replication between the VMs on the primary site to the secondary site.
  • Seamlessly failover virtual machines from the primary site to the recovery site in the event of a disaster.
  • Make use of Recovery Plans and other features of the Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager service.

Previous Provider Version : Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider ( Version 3.3.150.0) is available at http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=42635
Previous Provider Version : Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider (Version 3.3.140.0) is available at http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=42285
Previous Provider Version (Pre-release) : Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider ( Version 3.3.100.0) is available at http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=35ac9a9c-4315-4bbe-9297-b792903e7666
systemRequirementsSection:
The following are the system requirements for the provider to be installed:
System Center 2012 R2 RTM Virtual Machine Manager along with Windows Server R2 RTM installed on primary and secondary hosts or Windows Server 2012 installed on primary and secondary hosts.
System Center Virtual Machine Manager SP1 CU3 or above needs to be installed along with Windows Server 2012 with latest updates.
Please refer to prerequisites and support matrix for Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Service to ensure that all the pre-requisites for Hyper-V Recovery Manager environment are met.
installInstructionSection: Download the Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider setup on the host with a supported version of System Center Virtual Machine Manager installed and run it.
